=Compose an email with no Subject and using tags:

, ,

  • following from {{ $('Take Value2').item.json.project.adminName }} at CmsMart to {{ $('Take Value2').item.json.client.name }} with no Subject, confirming milestone completion for {{ $('Take Value2').item.json.milestone.name }}. Ask the customer for feedback on the milestone, confirm their satisfaction and mention next steps. The tone should be friendly, professional and appreciative. =Write a friendly end-of-project email from {{ $('Take Value3').item.json.project_admin.name }} at CmsMart to {{ $('Take Value3').item.json.client.name }}, summarizing the project achievements and thanking them for their partnership on {{ $('Take Value3').item.json.project.name }}. Request final feedback, express openness to future collaborations, and suggest any relevant next steps or additional services. The tone should be appreciative, professional, and forward-looking. AI Node Output: Generates a wrap-up email with a summary of achievements, a thank-you note, and an invitation for future collaboration using
to line space. With the information below: {{ $json.prepareText }} using card html:

,

=Write an email using card:

, ,

    ,
  • with a warm greeting from {{ $('Take Value1').item.json.project.adminname }} at CmsMart to {{ $('Take Value1').item.json.project.clientname }} with no Subject, no Welcome. Introduce the project team members, outline their roles, and establish communication protocols. Encourage the client to contact you with any initial questions. The tone should be friendly, welcoming, and professional. With the information below: {{ $json.prepareText }} Link project: {{ $('Take Value1').item.json.project.name }}

=Write emails that start with Dear without Subject and use tags:

  • followed by {{ $('Take Value2').item.json.project.adminName }} at CmsMart to {{ $('Take Value2').item.json.client.name }} without Subject, confirming milestone completion for {{ $('Take Value2').item.json.milestone.name }}. Ask the customer for feedback on the milestone, confirm their satisfaction and mention next steps. The tone should be friendly, professional and appreciative.
